divs: Sighting DetailsI have been informed by the alian leaders to help them inform the american people and the people of the planet earth that it was time they meet with all of use to explain why there here and how long they intend to be here. This meeting will take place in Death Valley, CA on July 8th 20008 around 10:00-11:00 pm. Many people know about this meeting already but this is for the record. Thanks This is all the information I have been given up to know.
